Sentencas: This paper presents a view to better design SOFC cathode materials based on the combination of Ruddlesden-Popper (RP) phases.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The influence of composite cathodes over single phases on electrochemical properties was studied, based on nickelate compounds.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: These electrodes are a mixture of La2NiO4+delta (L2N1) and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n = 2, L3N2 or 3, L4N3) homogeneously distributed or with a gradient in composition.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: All these phases crystallize in an Fmmm orthorhombic layered Ruddlesden-Popper structure.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Screen printing (SP) and Electrostatic Spray Deposition (ESD) have been used to architecturally design these electrodes.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The functionally graded cathodes show better electrical performance with respect to the homogeneous ones.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Polarization resistance (R-pol) values as low as 0.21 and 0.22 Omega cm(2) at 600 degrees C are achieved for cathodes based on L2N1 : L3N2 and L2N1 : L4N3 phases, respectively.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: This grading process appears to be an attractive strategy to improve the cathode performance.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Moreover, the stability of both graded composite cathodes was investigated over 15 days in air at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: Functionally graded and homogeneous composites of La2NiO4+δ and Lan+1NinO3n+1 (n=2 and 3) solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
